question: In which of the following conditions, an account becomes a NPA (Non Performing Asset) ?
option1: A bill purchased or discounted was overdue since last 87 days
option2: A cash Credit account is out of order for more than 90 Days
option3: Interest and Principal is not paid for not less than 75 days
option4: Where a loan taken in Rabi is not paid by coming up Kharif season
answer: A cash Credit account is out of order for more than 90 Days
